items.preText: Mushfiqur comes out at No. 4, two slips for him too
items.text: accurate line on the off stump, length delivery, and he defends carefully
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slightly wide outside off, het shoulders arms this time
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: makes him play this time with an off-stump line, nice bounce and Mushfiqur defends with a straight bat
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: from slightly wide of the crease to bring the ball in with the angle, Mushfiqur watches that and blocks again
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: more towards the leg stump now with the angle, he defends towards midwicket now
items.postText: Leebro: "I'm sorry but i just can't understand NZ's infatuation with Ferguson. I understand he's bowling at 150K/H but he's still too erratic and expensive. Surely there are other players on the domestic scene who deserve a chance."
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nice shape and swing just around off stump, pretty full, he pushes it into the covers
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: towards the pads now, Soumya needs only a small error from the bowler and he clips that away nicely in the air through the vacant midwicket region for a four
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: short ball, he hooks, gets a top edge, shouts of 'catch it' but it's gone slightly fine to beat long leg and gets four more
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: eases into that drive nicely to send it in the cover region for two in the gap. Bit too full and nicely done by Soumya
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: angling in a bit this time into Soumya, he tucks it to midwicket
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: loud, loud appeal for lbw, umpire S Ravi won't move at all, there were two noises probably and NZ review that after Williamson walks in from cover. The length delivery is swinging in, he looked to clip it to leg and got an inside edge just before the ball hit the pads. New Zealand lose their review
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: angling in towards the pads from length, clipped straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: pretty short and wide, Mushfiqur gets room and cuts but only bottom-edges it towards third man
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: what a shot for six! That looked like a normal short ball towards Soumya but he saw the length so early, and smacked that to the square leg boundary, hitting a six out of nowhere! Almost breathtaking
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: back towards the stumps, no use bowling short to him, and it's pushed into the covers for one
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: off stump line from Henry, no room at all, and he blocks it back
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: gives him the charge by dancing down the track, Mushfiqur is not going to get dominated, makes room too and he smashes that down the ground, straight enough to beat mid-off
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.preText: Mike: "Bit harsh on Ferguson. He's averaging 24 with the ball since the start of 2018, and in that time only 5 of his 14 matches has he gone at more than six an over. He's a wicket taker and a massive point of difference in this side."
items.text: little bit of away swing outside off, Soumya pushes it away from his body and gets an inside edge to fine leg
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: Mushfiqur has been hit on the helmet, but he looks fine. That was a nasty short ball on the leg side, Mushfiqur went on his toes and took his eyes off the ball with his hands in front of his face, and the ball bounced enough to bounce off the helmet to reach Guptill at square leg
items.postText: The Bangladesh physio comes out and is having a chat with Mushfiqur who has his helmet in his hand. Boult went up to Mushfiqur too initially. Everything looks ok
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: oh another bouncer! This one around middle and off and Mushfiqur lets it go easily
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nicely pitched just outside off, bit of angle, tempting line to poke but Mushfiqur resists the temptation and leaves it
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length delivery on off, Mushfiqur watches carefully and defends by leaning into that delivery
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: oh, he's chopped it on! Mushfiqur was doing well in that over after taking a blow on the helmet. He was judging the lines well, leaving and defending them. This delivery nips in just a bit after pitching outside off, Mushfiqur goes for the cut and the movement takes his inside edge to rattle off stump
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

items.preText: Mohammad Mithun at No. 5. They need someone to give Somya some company
items.text: length delivery around off, driven straight to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: Soumya has been bounced out here and Bangladesh lose the biggest wicket of the day. Henry banged it in short, Soumya went for the hook and got a top edge that went high enough for Henry to run towards the short leg region to get under it just in time
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, OUT

dismissal.text: Soumya Sarkar c & b Henry 30 (34m 22b 5x4 1x6) SR: 136.36
